Hi Micheal, 

The answer to your question is "Yes". The logic in that metho=
d
basically tries to transform this object into an array of Objects, So
sta=
rting from the next step we need that object for proceeding with
our logic.=
 

I too agree that it might bcome an overhead for mocking the getter
metho=
ds, is there any pattern here I can use to fix this ?

Thanks and Regards, =

Sarat kumar.
